Posts.Content: scaredmomoftwo wrote: Hello I'm 35 mom of two....about two months ago I noticed swelling in my left armpit. Couple days later I started getting pain down the side and it started to become swollen. My left breast was always significantly smaller then my right now they are the same size. I went to my gynecologist they did a mammogram and ultrasound, no lumps ....So I have made a appt with a breast surgeon...my breast is still swollen, achy and sharp pains sometimes..... I am really scared .....and bracing myself for the worst. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 35 with swollen, painful breast scaredmomoftwo scaredmomoftwo
